data.name: Chainsaw Warrior - The Official Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Chainsaw Warrior - The Official Soundtrack is a 2-track album of the music from Chainsaw Warrior, provided in 320kbps MP3 format.

It’s a small but heartfelt thank you from the team here at Auroch Digital to all the Chainsaw Warrior fans who have bought the Chainsaw Warrior games, talked with us about them in our forums, and shared their thoughts about them online.

Tracklist
  • 1. Main Theme - 03:00
  • 2. Remix - 01:41
Note: After downloading this content, these tracks can be found in the Chainsaw Warrior folder in the Steam Directory. For more information on the Steam Music Library and Player, click here.

Credits
Tracks 1 and 2 written and arranged by Stuart Duffield.

data.short_description: The official soundtrack to the video game adaptation of Games Workshop’s cult classic board game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3
  • Processor: Intel 1.6GHz Processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 20 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS Version: 10.6.x or later
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo Processor ( 1.7GHz or later )
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 20 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 / Steam OS
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
